name: Victories Under George III
obverse: Bust of George III facing right.
reverse: A winged woman representing Victory stands on clouds. She holds a crown in her right hand and a wreath in her left.
reverse_inscriptions: HUJUS SUB AUSPICIIS FLORESCENT QUOTIDIE MAGIS
description: This medal commemorates victories under King George III.
The Battle of Trafalgar (1805) is a likely candidate for a specific victory this medal is meant to represent.
